Title: Innocence
Description:
['With Major Motoko Kusanagi missing, Section 9's Batou is assigned to investigate a string of gruesome murdersâ€”seemingly at the hands of faulty gynoids, or sex robots. But when a faulty gynoid leaves Batou a cryptic message, he begins to question the cause of their malfunctions. Suspicions of politically motivated murder and an illegal "ghost" quickly crop up, drawing Batou and his partner Togusa into a perilous web of conspiracy.', '
', '
', '
', '
As their investigation goes on, the line between man and machine continues to blur, and reality and perception become indistinguishable. Confronting strange and dangerous foes, Batou and Togusa explore a futuristic world filled with machines and living dolls but utterly devoid of humanity.', '
', '
', '
', '
[Written by MAL Rewrite]']
Voices: ['Ootsuka, Akio', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Nakano, Yutaka', 'Sakakibara, Yoshiko', 'Takenaka, Naoto']
